item.title: Use custom domain to send emails by AWS SES
item.description: In most applications, you may need SMTP service for send some system notifications, you need not hosting your own SMTP server, because it is much more difficult to do reliably than to use a third-party provider. In this article, I will show how I use the AWS SES on my own domain. Get a domain You can get one from onamae, also you can get one from godaddy. But I think if you manage your applications on AWS, you should consider the AWS Route 53.
